item.title: Amberley Lions Charity Golf Tournament
item.desc:
Dates: 7 APRIL 2013 Venue: Amberley Beach Golf Course
18 Hole Charity Match.
Entries close April 2nd. Don't miss out - Limited to 140 entries! The Draw will be Advertised in Friday's Press prior.
Proceeds from this tournament will go towards the Development of Youth in the North Canterbury Area.
$1000 "hole in one" on holes - 3, 6, 10 & 17 - If not struck then a $5 entry fee raffle with three draws of $200 will follow.
Heaps of Great Prizes! 5 Player Divisions Ã??Ã?Â¢?? Nett & Stableford
Cost: $25 - includes lunch
Contact: Alex Cooke

item.title: Barbara Turner Exhibition - Sea Breeze
item.desc:
Dates: 05 March - 07 April 2013 Days: Wednesdays to Saturdays Time: 10am - 5pm.
Now showing at the Crossroads Gallery - Barbara Turner.
A collection of acrylic on canvas paintings. Barbara's art is bright colourful paintings of deep coves, waterways, anchored boats to bush clad hills, coastlines and baches.
